# load(_:)

**Instance Method**

Loads the specified extension context.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func load(_ extensionContext: WKWebExtensionContext) throws
```

## Discussion

Causes the context to start, loading any background content, and injecting any content into relevant tabs.

## Related Documentation

- **load(_:)**: Loads the specified extension context.
